              some
               
              order
               
              in
               
              the
               
              town
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
Placing
               
              therein
               
              some
               
              expert
               
              officers
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
And
               
              then
               
              depart
               
              to
               
              Paris
               
              to
               
              the
               
              King
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
For
               
              there
               
              young
               
              Henry
               
              with
               
              his
               
              nobles
               
              lie
              .

speaker: BURGUNDY
text:
What
               
              wills
               
              Lord
               
              Talbot
               
              pleaseth
               
              Burgundy
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
But
               
              yet
              ,
               
              before
               
              we
               
              go
              ,
               
              let’s
               
              not
               
              forget

speaker: TALBOT
text:
The
               
              noble
               
              Duke
               
              of
               
              Bedford
               
              late-deceased
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
But
               
              see
               
              his
               
              exequies
               
              fulfilled
               
              in
               
              Roan
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
A
               
              braver
               
              soldier
               
              never
               
              couchèd
               
              lance
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
A
               
              gentler
               
              heart
               
              did
               
              never
               
              sway
               
              in
               
              court
              .

speaker: TALBOT
text:
But
               
              kings
               
              and
               
              mightiest
               
              potentates
               
              must
               
              die
              ,

speaker: TALBOT
text:
For
               
              that’s
               
              the
               
              end
               
              of
               
              human
               
              misery
              .
